description: Not a martial art, this is just plain old punching and kicking.

By disregarding offensive in favor of self-defense, you are better at protecting.

Blocked damage reduced by 100% of Dexterity.

An intermediate aikido practitioner can protect themselves against multiple opponents.

static_buffs.name: Advanced Aikido
static_buffs.description:
An advanced aikido practitioner can protect themselves against even more opponents than normal.

+1 Block attempts, +1 Dodge attempts.

A solid stance allows you block more damage than normal and deliver better punches.

You are make yourself harder to hit by bobbing and weaving as you move.

You've seen your chance. Now strike back!

%s gets ready to brawl.

static_buffs.name: Enhanced Blocking
static_buffs.description:
Combat experience has led to you being able to block multiple attacks at a time.

static_buffs.description:
You never stop moving while performing the ginga.  This makes you very mobile while fighting.

+1.0 Dodge skill, +1 Dodge attempts.

onmiss_buffs.description:
You didn't miss, it's just part of the dance and the best part is about to start!

+15% Bash damage.

You can feel the rhythm as you move.  Not only are you harder to hit, but your kicks are even more amazing!

%s assumes a crane-like stance.

static_buffs.description:
Your attacks strike at your opponents weakness with speed and precision instead of brute force.
Dexterity increases melee damage instead of Strength.

onmove_buffs.description:
Just like a bird, you take to the air to avoid danger.

%s assumes a dragon-like stance.

static_buffs.name: Dragon's Knowledge
static_buffs.description:
You plan your attack far in advance relying on your intuition instead of your speed to strike true.
Intelligence increases Accuracy instead of Dexterity.

Accuracy increased by 25% of Intelligence but decreased by 25% of Dexterity.

onhit_buffs.name: Dragon's Flight
onhit_buffs.description:
Life and combat are a circle.  An attack leads to a counter and to an attack once again.  Seek to complete this loop.

description: Eskrima, also known as Kali, is a Filipino martial art.  It emphasizes rapid strikes with knife and baton weapons, along with a variety of improvised substitutes.

%s enters an open stance.

static_buffs.name: Eskrima Stance
static_buffs.description:
You are skilled at getting the most out of your weapons.  The term 'weapon' might be very subjective,

oncrit_buffs.description:
You can follow up a critical hit with a stronger attack if the opportunity presents itself.

+15% bonus to all damage.

description: The noble art of fencing is taught with flexible competition blades, but the techniques are derived from (and applicable to) more functional examples.  Skilled fencers can take advantage of blocks and feints to deliver accurate strikes.

static_buffs.name: Fencing Stance
static_buffs.description:
Your side stance minimizes the chances you will be harmed in a combat.

Your next strike will find its mark much easier from your parry.

onmiss_buffs.description:
Your feint is the perfect setup for a devastating followup attack!

%s grips their weapon tightly.

static_buffs.name: Stand Your Ground
static_buffs.description:
You are stalwart and will not budge against any threat.

static_buffs.description:

In addition, you can counter grabs and takedown attacks with a judo throw.

static_buffs.name: Karate Stance

description: The art of the longsword and sword & shield, preceding the later development of fencing.  Designed for combat both unarmored and in armor, it includes grappling as well as defensive and offensive sword techniques.  This treatise compares the Italian and German traditions of medieval combat with detailed step-by-step pictures.

Taking a hit will not slow you down.  You will outlast your opponent and win this fight.

%s performs a series of intricate hand signs.

static_buffs.name: Ninjutsu Stance
static_buffs.description:
Your training allows you to make no noise when attacking and less noise when moving around.

Melee and unarmed attacks generate 0 noise.  Moving generates 1/2 as much noise.

static_buffs.name: Sneak Attack
static_buffs.description:
To a true shinobi, the first strike and the last strike are one in the same.

+50% all damage.

Perception increases damage and reduces blocked damage.  Moving and attacking reduces dodging and damage until you pause.  Pausing for a moment increases Dodge skill.

It has a high stance, with weight entirely on the rear leg.  Wing Chun focuses on sensitivity to the opponent's direction of force, and flowing around it to get back to hitting.

You have a greater understanding of Zui Quan.  Your skills at dodging and landing attacks are much better as a result.
